textBeforeTable: Base Game General BooksEdit In The Sims 3: Into the Future, the books in Oasis Landing are E-Books. There are a wide range of premade books that cannot be bought, but are instead gained through opportunities in work or adventures. Sims can buy many premade books from the bookstore, a rabbit hole found in premade neighborhoods such as Riverview. General books also appear to read in the library. Price Number of pages Small/Medium/Large Distinct genre/type cover There are a variety of books in The Sims 3, including different genres and books with dramatically different properties such as skill books and compositions. There is a wide variety of possible book covers, and several different sizes. Generally, books have the following properties: General BooksEdit Three different books in The Sims 3.
